entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:00 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023
